item.title: ‘P.I. Moms’ Was a Train Wreck for Lifetime. Now It’s a ‘Trainwreck’ on Netflix
item.description: The Hollywood Reporter tracked down filmmaker Phil Bowman to talk about the hit cable series that never was.

item.title: ‘Are You My First?’ Reality Series Brings Together Virgins Searching for Love
item.description: Hulu’s new “dating experiment” comes from the producers of ‘Love Island,’ and is co-hosted by the first virgin Bachelor, Colton Underwood, along with former Bachelorette Kaitlyn Bristowe.

item.title: ‘Are You My First?’ Reality Series Brings Together Virgins Searching for Love

item.title: ‘Love Island USA’ Star Amaya Espinal, the People’s Princess, Will Never Let Anyone Dim Her Light
item.description: Despite feeling misunderstood at times in the ‘Love Island USA’ villa, the winner and fan-favorite from the Peacock reality show’s seventh season is so grateful to America “for accepting me for who I

item.title: Emily Simpson Almost Took a Break From ‘The Real Housewives of Orange County’ Amid Her Son’s Health Diagnosis
item.description: The reality star opens up to The Hollywood Reporter about how she navigated her child’s health condition in real time during season 19 and which of her co-stars she felt the most supported by.

item.description: The reality star opens up to The Hollywood Reporter about how she navigated her child’s health condition in real time during season 19 and which of her co-stars she felt the most supported by.

item.title: MomTok on Top: ‘The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives’ Earns First Emmy Nomination
item.description: Hulu’s breakout series, centered around a group of Mormon mom influencers, was nominated in the outstanding unstructured reality program category on Tuesday.

item.title: Gabby Windey to Host Alex Cooper’s ‘Love Overboard’ Reality Dating Series
item.description: The season three ‘Traitors’ winner will front the Hulu series from the ‘Call Her Daddy’ podcast host, set to debut next year.

item.title: ‘Love Island’ Trio Leah, Serena and JaNa Are About to Get Vulnerable on ‘Beyond the Villa’ Spinoff
item.description: The fan-favorite PPG trifecta reunites in the new Peacock spinoff series that premiered Sunday.

item.title: Kenny and Kaylor Hope ‘Love Island USA’ Fans “Can Relate to Us More” in ‘Beyond the Villa’
item.description: The Peacock spinoff follows fan-favorite season six Islanders as they navigate life and love outside the ‘Love Island USA’ Villa.
